name: My First Game (DavidSantos)
description:
Simple platformer where the goal is to collect as many coins the player can to get a high score while avoiding the hazard of lava.

Left and right on the arrow keys move the player left and right respectively, up allows the player to jump while pressing up in midair does a double jump. Pressing down while in the air plummets the player to the ground.

Two probelms I faced when creating this game was making levels that got progressively harder and how to properly do a credits screen. I got the credits screen more or less how I wanted it and I got the levels to feel like they get more challenging as you go on.
